snippet: VINSON--Myron "Mike", on December 30, 2015. Adored husband of Carol. Beloved father of Daniel and Laura. Cherished grandfather of Adam and Hannah. Service January 3, 2016, 10am at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street. 1/3
lead_paragraph: VINSON--Myron "Mike", on December 30, 2015. Adored husband of Carol. Beloved father of Daniel and Laura. Cherished grandfather of Adam and Hannah. Service January 3, 2016, 10am at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street. 1/3
